site_name: Ground/second Floor Flat (front), 27 Cadogan Square, LONDON, SW1X 0HU
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (Submission of details) of listed building consent LB/24/02344 (Internal refurbishment includes: creating a master bedroom in downstairs reception room; conversion of utility/kitchen room into en suite bathroom; creation of kitchen and pantry in first-floor rear rooms; addition of cloakroom into staircase mezzanine area; alterations to second floor bedrooms and bathrooms; new flooring throughout ground and first floors; removal of lighting tracks in reception rooms; and provision of new lighting scheme to principal rooms)
